## MessageCenter.emit() method

Send message to local or other instance of extension

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
emit<Key extends keyof ITypedMessages>(key: Key, data: ITypedMessages[Key]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | Key | Key of the message |
|  data | ITypedMessages\[Key\] | Data of the message |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
